item.description:
Amy recommended we hike at Devils Hopyard State Park for our next hike.

UPDATE:
Upon visiting the park, the main parking lot is not plowed very well, and some of the others are closed off. It would be best if we met at the parking lot on Foxtrot Rd. (Flat and Plowed) The parking lot is near where Foxtrot Rd. intersects with Hopyard Rd.

If you are coming from the south follow the signs to the park and when you see the main entrance on your right keep going a short distance and you will see a right turn onto Foxtrot. The parking lot is immediately on the left side.

If you are coming from the north end when you see the signs for the park take the left onto Foxtrot Rd. and the parking lot is on your left side.




Directions (Per DEP website)
From CT Route 9: take Exit 7, then a left at the end of the exit ramp onto CT Route 154 north. Take a right at the first traffic light and follow the signs.

From Interstate 395: take Exit 80 west. Take a right onto CT Route 82 west. Take a right onto Hopyard Road and follow signs.

From I-91S: take Exit 22. Take Route 9S, Exit 10. Take Route 9AS to Tylerville. Take Route 82E over CT River for about 3 miles. At the stop sign take a right, and then take immediate left. Follow that road for approximately 8 miles, then follow the signs.


As usual we will wait approximately 10 min. for late arrivals.

Devils Hopyard State Park website
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

Trail Map
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

Google Maps
http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the parking lot with a Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Devils Hopyard State Park
